TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit GlyphTypeface extends System.Object implements class System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitialize

summary.span: 指定与磁盘上的字体文件相对应的物理字体。

span.span: Specifies a physical font face that corresponds to a font file on the disk.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对象是一种低级别文本对象，它对应于 OpenType 字体文件所表示的字体系列的单个面，或序列化为文档中的内存块。The object is a low level text object that corresponds to a single face of a font family as represented by an OpenType font file, or serialized as a block of memory in a document. 用于 给定逻辑字体中的字符运行的正确通常由 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] 字体系统确定，并记录在 对象和行格式文本 api 生成的对象中。The correct to use for a run of characters in a given logical font is normally determined by the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] font system and recorded in the objects generated by the object and line formatting text APIs. 为提供以下属性和方法：The provides properties and methods for: - 获取字体常用指标，例如上升和下降与 em 大小的比率。Obtaining font face common metrics, such as the ratio of ascent and descent to em size. - 获取单个标志符号的指标、轮廓和位图。Obtaining metrics, outlines, and bitmaps for individual glyphs. - 文档中的序列化。Serialization in a document. 下面的列表描述了应用程序方案的类型，这些方案演示了使用对象提供的低级别控件的值 。The following list describes the type of application scenarios that illustrate the value of using the low-level control that the object provides. - 固定格式文档生成器可以使用获取用于 嵌入文档容器的字体的二进制图像A fixed format document generator may use the to obtain a binary image of the font for embedding in a document container - 打印机驱动程序可以使用 来获取字体标志符号大纲或位图，或使用整个字体图像发送到打印机。A printer driver may use the to obtain font glyph outlines or bitmaps, or the entire font image for sending to the printer. - 查看器应用程序可使用 来获取指标和位图信息。A viewer application may use the to obtain metric and bitmap information. 每个字形都定义了用于指定其与其他的对齐方式的指标 。Each glyph defines metrics that specify how it aligns with other . 下图定义了字形字符的指标值。The following graphic defines metric values for glyph characters. ![标志符号度量示意图](~/add/media/glyph-example.png "标志符号度量示意图")![Diagraph of glyph measurements](~/add/media/glyph-example.png "Diagraph of glyph measurements") 字形字符的指标值Metric values of glyph characters

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class using the specified font file location.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数 通过由指定的 OpenType 字体来创建新的对象 `typefaceSource` 。This constructor creates a new object from an OpenType font face specified by `typefaceSource`. 构造的 对象不使用样式模拟。The constructed object does not use style simulations. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何 通过指定字体文件位置来创建类的新实例。The following example shows how to create a new instance of the class by specifying a font file location. [!code-csharp[GlyphTypefaceSnippets#GlyphTypefaceSnippet1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/GlyphTypefaceSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#glyphtypefacesnippet1)] [!code-vb[GlyphTypefaceSnippets#GlyphTypefaceSnippet1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/GlyphTypefaceSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#glyphtypefacesnippet1)]

Public Sub New (typefaceSource As Uri, styleSimulations As StyleSimulations)

param.name: typefaceSource
param.span: 用于指定字体文件位置的 URI。

span.span: The URI that specifies the location of the font file.
One of the values.

summary.span: 使用指定的字体文件位置和 值初始化 类的一个新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class using the specified font file location and value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数 从由和指定的 OpenType 字体表面创建新的对象 `typefaceSource` `styleSimulations` 。This constructor creates a new object from an OpenType font face specified by `typefaceSource` and `styleSimulations`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性用于计算垂直布局。The property is used for calculating vertical layout. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何从字体中的字形返回高级高度的集合。The following example shows how to return the collection of advance heights from the glyphs in the font. [!code-csharp[GlyphTypefaceSnippets#GlyphTypefaceSnippet2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/GlyphTypefaceSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#glyphtypefacesnippet2)] [!code-vb[GlyphTypefaceSnippets#GlyphTypefaceSnippet2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/GlyphTypefaceSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#glyphtypefacesnippet2)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property BottomSideBearings As IDictionary(Of UShort, Double)
public: property System::Collections::Generic::IDictionary<System::UInt16, double> ^ BottomSideBearings { System::Collections::Generic::IDictionary<System::UInt16, double> ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取由 对象表示的标志符号中从黑盒下边缘到步进向量底端的距离。

span.span: Gets the distance from bottom edge of the black box to the bottom end of the advance vector for the glyphs represented by the object.

value.span: 一个 对象，包含表示距离信息的键/值对。

span.span: An object that contains key/value pairs that represent distance information.

value.span: 该键是一个标识标志符号的 。

span.span: The key is a that identifies the glyph.

value.span: 该值是一个表示距离的 。

span.span: The value is a that represents the distance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当黑盒的下边缘位于由高级宽度和字体单元高度定义的对齐矩形内时，值为正。The value is positive when the bottom edge of the black box is within the alignment rectangle defined by the advance width and font cell height. 字体单元高度是垂直布局中的水平维度。The font cell height is a horizontal dimension in vertical layout. 当黑色框的下边缘 overhangs 对齐矩形时，该值为负数。The value is negative when the bottom edge of the black box overhangs the alignment rectangle.

span.span: A that indicates the distance from the baseline to the top of an English capital letter, expressed as a fraction of the font em size.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果字体文件没有为指定的语言提供名称，则 属性将返回以英语表示的人脸名称。If the font file does not provide a name for the specified language, the property returns the face name in English. 人脸名称可以标识权重、样式和/或拉伸信息。The face name may identify weight, style, and/or stretch information.

summary.span: 获取由 对象表示的标志符号中从黑盒右边缘到步进向量右端的距离。

span.span: Gets the distance from the right edge of the black box to the right end of the advance vector for the glyphs represented by the object.

value.span: 一个 对象，包含表示距离信息的键/值对。

span.span: An object that contains key/value pairs that represent distance information.

value.span: 该键是一个标识标志符号索引的 。

span.span: The key is a that identifies the glyph index.

value.span: 该值是一个表示距离的 。

span.span: The value is a that represents the distance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当黑盒的尾部边缘位于由高级宽度和字体单元高度定义的对齐矩形内时，值为正。The value is positive when the trailing edge of the black box is within the alignment rectangle defined by the advance width and font cell height. 当黑色框的右边缘 overhangs 对齐矩形时，该值为负数。The value is negative when the right edge of the black box overhangs the alignment rectangle.

summary.span: 获取 对象的示例文本信息。

value.span: 一个 对象，包含表示示例文本信息的键/值对。

span.span: An object that contains key/value pairs sample text information.

value.span: 键是标识区域性的一个 对象。

span.span: The key is a object that identifies the culture.

value.span: 该值是一个描述示例文本信息的字符串。

span.span: The value is a string that describes the sample text information.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 该值可以是字体名称，也可以是设计器认为是在中显示字体的最佳示例。The value can be the font name, or any other text that the designer thinks is the best sample to display the font in.

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示从基线到字样删除线的距离。

value.span: 一个表示删除线位置的 。

span.span: A that represents the strikethrough position.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 删除线位置值通常为正，因为删除线通常高于基线。The strikethrough position value is usually positive because the strikethrough is generally above the baseline.

summary.span: 获取由 对象表示的标志符号中从垂直步进向量的顶端到黑盒上边缘的距离。

span.span: Gets the distance from the top end of the vertical advance vector to the top edge of the black box for the glyphs represented by the object.

value.span: 一个 对象，包含表示距离信息的键/值对。

span.span: An object that contains key/value pairs that represent distance information.

value.span: 该键是一个标识标志符号索引的 。

span.span: The key is a that identifies the glyph index.

value.span: 该值是一个表示距离的 。

span.span: The value is a that represents the distance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当黑盒的上边缘处于步进高度和字体单元高度所定义的对齐矩形内时，值为正。The value is positive when the top edge of the black box is within the alignment rectangle defined by the advance height and font cell height. 字体单元高度是垂直布局中的水平维度。The font cell height is a horizontal dimension in vertical layout. 当黑色框的上边缘 overhangs 对齐矩形时，该值为负。The value is negative when the top edge of the black box overhangs the alignment rectangle.

summary.span: 获取 中的下划线位置。

span.span: Gets the position of the underline in the .

value.span: 一个表示下划线位置的 值。

span.span: A value that represents the position of the underline.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下划线位置与基线相关，相对于 em 大小。The underline position is relative to the baseline and relative to the em size. 返回的位置值通常为负值，因为下划线通常低于基线。The returned position value is usually negative because an underline is usually below the baseline.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 字体供应商可以在 URL 中嵌入唯一序列号，然后可以使用该序列号来注册字体。A font vendor could embed a unique serial number in the URL, which could then be used to register the font.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 版本字符串的格式明显不同。Version strings vary significantly in format. 若要获取数值形式的版本，请使用 -not 尝试分析属性的值 。To obtain the version as a numeric value, use the - do not attempt to parse the value of the property.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Win32FaceNames As IDictionary(Of CultureInfo, String)

public: property System::Collections::Generic::IDictionary<System::Globalization::CultureInfo ^, System::String ^> ^ Win32FaceNames { System::Collections::Generic::IDictionary<System::Globalization::CultureInfo ^, System::String ^> ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取由 对象表示的字体的 Win32 字体名称。

span.span: Gets the Win32 face name for the font represented by the object.

value.span: 一个 对象，包含表示 Win32 字体名称信息的键/值对。

span.span: An object that contains key/value pairs that represent Win32 face name information.

value.span: 键是标识区域性的一个 对象。

span.span: The key is a object that identifies the culture.

value.span: 该值是一个表示 Win32 字体名称的字符串。

span.span: The value is a string that represents the Win32 face name.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果字体不提供指定语言的名称，它将返回以英语表示的人脸名称。If the font does not provide a name for the specified language, it returns the face name in English. Win32 字体名称可以标识除常规或粗体) 和/或样式以外的权重 (，但不能标识 stretch 或其他权重。The Win32 face name may identify weights (other than regular or bold), and/or style, but may not identify stretch or other weights.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Win32FamilyNames As IDictionary(Of CultureInfo, String)

public: property System::Collections::Generic::IDictionary<System::Globalization::CultureInfo ^, System::String ^> ^ Win32FamilyNames { System::Collections::Generic::IDictionary<System::Globalization::CultureInfo ^, System::String ^> ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取由 对象表示的字体的 Win32 系列名称。

span.span: Gets the Win32 family name for the font represented by the object.

value.span: 一个 对象，包含表示 Win32 系列名称信息的键/值对。

span.span: An object that contains key/value pairs that represent Win32 family name information.

value.span: 键是标识区域性的一个 对象。

span.span: The key is a object that identifies the culture.

value.span: 该值是一个表示 Win32 系列名称的字符串。

span.span: The value is a string that represents the Win32 family name.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果字体没有为指定的语言提供系列名称，则 属性将返回以英语表示的系列名称。If the font does not provide a family name for the specified language, the property returns the family name in English. Win32 系列名称不包括常规或粗体权重和样式，但包含其他粗细和拉伸。The Win32 family name excludes regular or bold weights and style, but it includes other weights and stretch.
